name: Checkbox

properties1.name: name
properties1.description: (mandatory) is the unique name of the parameter.

properties2.name: label
properties2.description: (mandatory) (translatable) is the descriptive title of the field.

properties3.name: value
properties3.description: (optional) is the value of the parameter if this checkbox is set (usually 1).

properties5.name: required
properties5.description: (optional) The field must be filled before submitting the form.

properties6.name: description
properties6.example: Show the title of the item
properties6.description: (optional) (translatable) is text that will be shown as a tooltip when the user moves the mouse over the label.

properties7.name: class
properties7.description: (optional) is a CSS class name for the HTML form field. If omitted this will default to 'inputbox'.

properties8.name: showon
properties8.description: (optional) show this field on the bases of the value in another field. https://joomla.stackexchange.com/a/17682/2166

description: The checkbox form field type provides a single checkbox. If the parameter has a saved value this is selected when the page is first loaded. If not, the default value (if any) is selected.
